narrative.description: A brass lantern with a reservoir for oil. Its flame pushes back the cave's hunger—but not forever.
narrative.low_battery: The flame gutters, casting frantic shadows. Oil runs dangerously low.
narrative.depleted: Darkness swallows the flame. The lantern is now dead weight—a monument to your miscalculation.

narrative.in_inventory: The egg pulses faintly against your chest—a captured heartbeat from the mountain's core.
narrative.deposited: Light bleeds from the egg as it touches stone. It has returned home.

narrative.in_inventory: Cold jewels press against your palm. Kings have killed for less.
narrative.deposited: The scepter rests among its kin. Power returns to the earth.

treasure_set.completion_message: All fifteen treasures rest in the chamber. The mountain releases its hold on you. Type DEPOSIT TREASURES to claim your 350 points and exit.
